text: Ofa gamir gumazim sipsipɨn kam isɨ, ofan bar isia mɨghɨriba ko, arazir kuraba gɨn amadir ofaba bagha me bulmakaubav sozir danganimɨn mangɨ a mɨsueghtɨ an aremegh. Guizbangɨra, osɨmtɨzim agevir ofaba, da arazir kuraba gɨn amadir ofabar mɨrara ghu. Kar nan bizimra, ezɨ kɨ God, kɨ a isa ofa gamir gumazibagh anɨngi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ofa gamir gumazim kamaghɨn damuam.
